meanings.definition: A traditional Japanese musical instrument with three strings.
meanings.sent1: I listened to the beautiful sound of the samisens at the cultural festival.
meanings.sent2: The musician played the samisens skillfully during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The samisens decided to start a band and tour around Japan.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the samisens painted a picture of tranquility in the room.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the samisens made them stand out among other instruments.

meanings.sent1: In the music store, I saw a collection of samisens displayed on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The group of musicians each held their samisens as they prepared to play together.
meanings.sent3: The samisens gathered for a meeting to discuss their upcoming concert.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the harmonious sound of multiple samisens playing together.
meanings.sent5: The samisens lined up in a row, ready to enchant the audience with their music.
